<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ancestry Entries](/Rules.aspx?ID=119)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 33 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Each entry includes details about the ancestry and presents the rules elements described below (all of these but heritages and ancestry feats are listed in a sidebar).
</column>

</row>
